name: Paranormal Real Estate Hunter
description:
You are a paranormal ghost hunter and you've recently found out that you could flip haunted houses by excorsising them! You will need to defend yourself with powerful anti-ghost weapons while excorsising the houses!

Controls

Ghost Hunter :

  • Shooting: Left mouse button,
  • Walk Left: Left Button,
  • Walk Right: Right Button,
  • Jumping: Space,
  • Exorsising:  Hold "E"
Analysis

This project is to see what can be improved within the game and to see if the players can easily learn how to play the game. Have fun and if there are any questions you can talk to the Researchers!

Creators
  • Andri Már Valsson
  • Eysteinn Örn Jónsson
  • Kristinn Ingi Reynisson
  • Tómas Ingi Villalobos
